subSubSection.paragraph:
Myelois leucocephala Staudinger, 1879
— Stettiner entomologische Zeitung , 40: 326. TL: Naryn [Narün], Atyrau region , W Kazakhstan .

Staudingeria psammicola Roesler, 1970
— Reichenbachia , 13 (7): 100–101. TL: “ 130 km OSO von Somon Bajanleg”, [ Övörkhangai aimak ], Mongolia . Syn. nov.

Type material examined.
Holotype of
psammicola
: ♂ , “ MONGOLIA : Uburchangaj , aimak, 130 km OSO von, Somon Bajanleg ,
1150 m
, Exp. Dr. Z. Kaszab , 1967” | “Nr. 882,
3.VII.1967
” | “Holo-type” | “ Staudingeria , psammicola, U. Roesler / Holotypus ”, (gen. slide 286/19, O. Bidzilya ) ( NHMB )
.
Paratypes : 1 ♀ , “ MONGOLIA : Uburchangaj, aimak, 130 km OSO von, Somon Bajanleg ,
1150 m
, Exp. Dr. Z. Kaszab , 1967” | “Nr. 882,
3.VII.1967
” | “Gamalt von, Dr. F. Gregor , für Micr. Pal.” | “Allo-, Holo-, type” | “ Staudingeria , psammicola, U. Roesler / Allotypus ”, (gen. slide 155/19, O. Bidzilya ) ( SMNK )
;
1 ♂ , “ MONGOLIA : Südgobi aimak, 100 km W v. Grenzposten, Ovot Chuural ,
1250 m
, Exp. Dr. Z. KASZAB, 1967” | “Nr. 834,22.
VI.1967
” | “Para-, type” | “ Staudingeria , psammicola, U. Roesler / Paratypus ”, (gen. slide 154/19, O. Bidzilya ) ( SMNK )
.

Additional material examined.
Russia
: 4 ♂ , 3 ♀ , Astrakhan reg., Dosang env.,
20–23.vi.2016
;
6 ♂ , 4 ♀ , same data but
26–28.v.2016
( ET )
.
Kazakhstan
: 1 ♀ , Mangistau reg., 43 SE of Shetpe , sands,
4.v.2019
;
1 ♂ , Mangistau reg., env. of vill. Beineu ,
21.v.2016
;
1 ♀ , Atyrau reg., Akkergeshen plateau,
20.vi.2017
( ET )
.
Uzbekistan
: 1 ♀ , Zhamansai, Kyzylkum ,
20.viii.1970
( Falkovitsh )
;
1 ♀ , Ajakguzhumdy , Dzhingildy 40 km E,
28.v.1965
( Pastukhov )
;
1 ♀ , Aznek ,
70 km S Tamdy Bulak
,
1.v.1965
( Falkovitsh )
.
Turkmenistan
: 1 ♂ , Ispas ,
70 km NW Tchardzhou
,
2.vi.1965
( Falkovitsh )
.
China
: 1 ♂ , Kuldja , coll. Wocke (all ZIN )
.

Remarks.
Staudingeria psammicola
was described from five males and three females collected in Uburchangai aimak and South Gobi aimak in Mongolia . Roesler (1970: 101) compared
A. psammicola
with
A. deserticola (Staudinger, 1870)
but not with
A. leucocephala ( Staudinger, 1879 )
. Our study of the holotype and two paratypes (male and female) of
A. psammicola
justified their conspecificity with
A. leucocephala
. The type material of the latter and the differences between
A. leucocephala
and
A. deserticola
were recently discussed (
Bidzilya et al . 2019
). Hence, the following synonymy is proposed:
Ancylosis psammicola ( Roesler, 1970 )
syn. nov.
of
Ancylosis leucocephala ( Staudinger, 1879 )
.

Distribution. Russia (Lower Volga and S Urals), Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Turkmenistan , Mongolia , W China ( Roesler 1973 ;
Sinev et al. 2019
). The records from Romania ( Roesler 1973 ; Speidel 1996 ; Plant & Jakšić 2018 ) should most likely be referred either to
A. deserticola
or to
A. larissae Bidzilya, Budashkin & Yepishin, 2019
.
